The CI workflow is based on docker, which generates huge amount of volumns. We need to prune these useless volumns to reclain space.
The solution here is to setup a system daemon to check and prune volumns periodically.

1. cp ./script/prune_docker_volumns.service /etc/systemd/system
2. cp prune_docker_volumns.sh to /root/
3. systemctl start prune_docker_volumns
4. journalctl --unit prune_docker_volumns --follow
5. systemctl enable prune_docker_volumns
